example.name: transitive
example.text: The laws of heredity dictate that half of the plants springing from these greenhouse-produced seeds will be male sterile and herbicide resistant and half will be male fertile and herbicide susceptible .
example.arg: that half of the plants springing from these greenhouse-produced seeds will be male sterile and herbicide resistant and half will be male fertile and herbicide susceptible

example.name: With arg2
example.text: What's going on today in Martyr Square dictates a new national political game to Speaker Berri, as well as the Lebanese parties involved.
example.arg: What's going on today in Martyr Square
to Speaker Berri, as well as the Lebanese parties involved.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'dictate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
